text: Joseph Ruskin (born Joseph Schlafman; April 14, 1924 - December 28, 2013) was an American character actor. He appeared in over 100 movies during his 50-year career. He appeared in Get Smart, Star Trek, Alias, and in The Twilight Zone. Ruskin died on December 28, 2013 at a hospital in Santa Monica, California. He died from natural causes, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: Joseph Ruskin
